attributes.action: Cut the number of traffic wardens on our streets - sign it and spread it
attributes.additional_details:
In these tough economic times, we want our taxes to pay for the salaries of; Doctors, Nurses, British Soldiers,
Teachers, and NOT to traffic wardens.

We call on the governement to massively cut the number of traffic wardens on our streets, and better allocate their salaries to those who positively contribute to this country's economic recovery.

rejection.details: This is a matter for local highway authorities.
